dunemask.util

Class JarUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • dunemask.util.JarUtil

  • public class JarUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Jar Utilities

    Extract Jar: extractAll(String, String, String)

    Extract Jar With Progress Bar: extractAllOpenDialog(String, String, String)

    Get Jar Program Path: getProgramPath()

    Is jar: isJar(String)

    List jar Entries: listJarEntries(File)

    Load File From Jar: loadFileInJar(File, String)

    Author:
    Elijah
